content: this hat is a very straightforward ribbed hat if you can knit and purl in the round you can make this hat you ll just be doing 2x2 ribbing throughout and changing the pattern from k2p2 to p2k2 every ten rounds as written the pattern will create a cozy hat without a brim if you prefer a hat with a foldover brim additional instructions are included with the pattern to complete the hat you ll want about 150y of worsted weight yarn if you want the foldover brim you ll probably want 200y to be safe
